channel.title: How to make Npc Drops
channel.description: i went under npc drops in source and for some reason its a short list but i ignored that i look on the first 1 it says 1 995 which im guessin 1 meanin the npc id and 995 meanin the item id it drops so i spawn it and kill it and it drops bones + charms and no money and 995 is money code and doesnt have the code on there for charms etc ... im trying to make it so other mobs drop other items i wanna add them myself how do i do this? thx for ur answers.

item.title: How to make Npc Drops
item.dc:creator: @xxbanditxx xxbanditxx
item.description:
@xxbanditxx wrote:

you want teamviewer help?
[/quote]
Nah its cool i can do it myself if u tell me how, thx.

Read full topic
